node.title: Justification by Faith in the Three Angels' Messages
node.description: The truth progressively unfolded in Revelation 14 reveals aspects of God’s character necessary to end the great controversy forever. Understanding this profound yet simple message will open the door for Jesus to finish His work—in us and, through us, for the world. We will examine what makes this last-day gospel message so powerful that it ushers in the latter rain and prepares a people for the final events of earth’s history.
